channel.title: Can Someone Copy me a website? (Reward if someone does)
channel.description:
I want someone to copy me this exact website so I can use it on mine - www.joox.net .
So u guys r probably saying like that i shouldnt be copying the site and stuff.. but i just need someone to copy it, then im going to edit it a lot so it wont be the same skin and will have a lot more stuff.
If someone can do this for me I can Reward them with $2.20 on Paypal and 162k on runescape and a level 19 with 32 strength and 10 attack, everything else is 1....
I know it aint that much but if someon could do this for me it would be highly appreciated...
Contact me on here or msn - gtech@gamerz-elite.com

item.title: Can Someone Copy me a website? (Reward if someone does)
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"
    "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
<head>
  <title>Stage6 toolbox</title>
  <base href="http://joox.net/">
  <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="template/style.css" />
</head>

<body>

<div id="container-body">

    <div id="header">

      <div id="logo">
        <a href="./" class="no_decoration"><img src="http://gyllig.com/~bubach/joox.gif" class="no_decoration" alt="joox" /></a>
      </div>

      <div id="menu">
        <ul>
          <li><a href="./"><b>START</b></a></li>
          <li><a href="./faq"><b>FAQ</b></a></li>

          <li><a href="./forum"><b>FORUM</b></a></li>
          <li><a href="./login"><b>LOG IN</b></a></li>
          <li><a href="./register"><b>REGISTER</b></a></li>
        </ul>

      </div>

    </div>

    <div class="clear"></div><br />

    <div id="body-content">

        <div class="box">
            <form method="post" action="./watch">
                <p style="text-align:center;"> <input class="input-box" type="text" name="address" style="width: 400px;" /> <input class="submit-box" type="submit" value=" Watch! " /> </p>
            </form>

            <p style="text-align:center;">Having troubles watching a stage6 video? This might help you, it even plays some<br />
            videos where the user or video is "deleted"! Enter the video address or ID and press "Watch!".</p>
        </div><br /><br />

        <h3>More updating</h3>
        Added some stuff.. Some of it is missing or incomplete, I'm working on it. ;-)<br />
        Mail me at asmhacker [at] gmail.com with bugreports, suggestions and stuff.<br /><br /><br />

        <h3>How to add a new video</h3>
        Get the address or stage6-ID to/for the video, copy it into the inputbox above and press watch.<br />
        If the video starts playing like it should, press the link under the player, "Add to category".<br />
        Enter video information, name and category, then press save. It's now placed under "Unconfirmed" until
        a secret amount of people report it as correct.


        <br /><br /><br /><br />

        <script type="text/javascript">
        <!--
            google_ad_client = "pub-1044406689767212";
            google_alternate_color = "000000";
            google_ad_width = 728;
            google_ad_height = 90;
            google_ad_format = "728x90_as";
            google_ad_type = "text";
            //2007-04-17: normal_bottom
            google_ad_channel = "6340055183";
            google_color_border = "000000";
            google_color_bg = "000000";
            google_color_link = "FFFFFF";
            google_color_text = "CCCCCC";
            google_color_url = "999999";
        //-->
        </script>

        <script type="text/javascript"
            src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js">
        </script>

    </div>


    <div id="body-sidebar">

        <a href="./">Start</a>        <br /><br />
        <a href="./cat/3">Anime</a><br />

        <a href="./cat/44">Documentaries</a><br />
        <a href="./cat/2">Movies</a><br />
        <a href="./cat/33">Movies with subtitles</a><br />
        <a href="./cat/34">Movies without subtitles</a><br />
        <a href="./cat/30">Music videos</a><br />
        <a href="./cat/1">TV shows</a><br />

        <br />
        <br /><a href="./unconfirmed">Recently added, needs confirmation</a><br />


    </div>

</div>

</body>
</html>

the css

body
{
    background-color: #000;
    font: 12px "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, Sans-serif;
    color: #E5E5E5;
}
a
{
    color: #88D9F3;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: bold;
}
a:hover
{
    text-decoration: underline;
}
.submit-box
{
    background: #272727 url(submit-background.gif) repeat-x;
    border: 1px solid #343434;
    padding: 3px 0px;
    color: #FFF;
    height: 27px;
}
#header
{
    margin-top: 20px;
    background: url(http://gyllig.com/~bubach/header.jpg) no-repeat center;
    height: 60px;
    overflow: hidden;
}
#logo
{
    float: left;
    margin-top: 7px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    width: 150px;
}
#menu
{
    float: left;
    width: 800px;
    height: 60px;
}
#menu ul
{
    float: right;
    margin-top: 20px;
    list-style: none;
    display: inline;
    white-space: nowrap;
    font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
}
#menu li
{
    display: inline;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
#menu a
{
    float: left;
    color: #fff;
    margin: 0 2px 0 0;
    padding: 0 0 0 2px;
    text-decoration: none;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
#menu a b
{
    float: left;
    display: block;
    padding: 5px 16px 5px 12px;
}
#menu a:hover
{
    background: #000;
    color: #5B8BA4;
    cursor: pointer;
}
.input-box
{
    background: #FFF url(input-background.gif) repeat-x;
    border: 1px solid #FFF;
    color: #000;
    margin: 0px;
    height: 22px;
    width: 250px;
}
.comment-input
{
    margin: 0px;
    width: 716px;
    padding: 3px;
    height: 100px;
    border: 1px solid #fff;
    background: #E5E5E5;
    color: #353535;
    font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, Arial;
    font-size: 12px;
    background: #FFF url(input-background.gif) repeat-x;
}
input.comment-submit
{
    color: #fff;
    font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, Arial;
    font-size: 12px;
    display: block;
    width: 728px;
    background: #000000;
    border: none;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 5px;
    background: url(header-background.png) 0px -95px repeat-x;
}
.bold
{
    font-weight: bold;
}
.gray_box
{
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 2px;
    background: #131313;
    border: 1px solid #363636;
    float: left;
    width: 200px;
    font-weight: bold;
}
option
{
    background: #000;
    color: #FFF;
}
.box
{
    text-align: left;
    border: 1px solid #363636;
    background: #131313;
    padding: 10px;
}
.smallbox
{
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 2px;
    float: left;
    width: 200px;
}
#container-body
{
    width: 990px;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    background: url('http://includes.stage6.com/noir/images/sidebar-background.jpg') no-repeat right 120px; 
}
#body-content
{
    width: 728px;
    float: left;
    text-align: center;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
#body-sidebar
{
    background: url('http://includes.stage6.com/noir/images/sidebar-background.jpg') no-repeat;
    width: 220px;
    min-height: 450px;
    padding: 10px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 15px;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.dotted
{
    width: 97%;
    padding-left: 10px;
    margin: auto;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #aaa;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.right
{
    text-align: right;
    width:97%;
}
.left
{
    text-align: left;
    width:97%;
}
.video
{
    float: right;
    width: 220px;
}
.clear
{
    clear: both;
}
div strong
{
    margin: 5px;
}
.quotebox
{
    width: 96%;
    margin: 5px;
    background-color: #000;
    padding: 5px;
    border: #A6A6A6 1px solid;
}
.u
{
    text-decoration: underline;
}
.center
{
    width: 97%;
    text-align: center;
}
.no_decoration, .no_decoration:hover
{
    border: 0px;
    text-decoration: none;
}


.xsnazzy p
{
    margin: 0 10px;
    padding-bottom: 0.5em;
}
.xsnazzy
{
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: left;
    background: transparent;
    margin: 1em;
}
.xb1, .xb2, .xb3, .xb4, .xb5, .xb6, .xb7
{
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    font-size: 0;
}
.xb1, .xb2, .xb3, .xb4, .xb5, .xb6
{
    height: 1px;
}
.xb4, .xb5, .xb6, .xb7
{
    background: #ccc;
    border-left: 1px solid #363636;
    border-right: 1px solid #363636;
}
.xb1
{
    margin: 0 8px;
    background: #363636;
}
.xb2
{
    margin: 0 6px;
    background: #363636;
}
.xb3
{
    margin: 0 4px;
    background: #363636;
}
.xb4
{
    margin: 0 3px;
    background: #131313;
    border-width: 0 5px;
}
.xb5
{
    margin: 0 2px;
    background: #131313;
    border-width: 0 4px;
}
.xb6
{
    margin: 0 2px;
    background: #131313;
    border-width: 0 3px;
}
.xb7
{
    margin: 0 1px;
    background: #131313;
    border-width: 0 3px;
    height: 2px;
}
.xboxcontent
{
    display: block;
    background: #131313;
    border: 3px solid #363636;
    border-width: 0 3px;
}

just make sure that you get everything that the code says it needs like images iframe pages ect then save them and change the location

Read full topic
